pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Weather Station Data from GHCN // The goal of 'GHCNr' is to provide a fast and friendly interface with the Global Historical Climatology Network daily (GHCNd) database, which contains daily summaries of weather station data worldwide (https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/products/land-based-station/global- historical-climatology-network-daily). GHCNd is accessed through the web API https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/access/services/data/v1. 'GHCNr' main functionalities consist of downloading data from GHCNd, filter it, and to aggregate it at monthly and annual scales.
